job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: <p>This is a work from anywhere position, though, if you want to visit the office, you can, just north of DC.</p><p><br></p><p>The BayTech Group, a boutique recruiting firm, is seeking a Lead Software Engineer for a growing organization developing Automation and AI Software in the US, based out of the DC area.</p><p><br></p><p>We are looking for a Lead and a Senior SW Engineer to help drive design, architecture and development decisions on 4-8+ person development teams.</p><p><br></p><p>Required and/or preferred:</p><ul><li>1-3+ years of Lead Engineering experience, developing scalable web apps, focusing on Javascript, Node.js, Typescript, etc</li><li>Ability and interest in contributing to design and architecture of custom software applications</li><li>Desire to work on a team with quality development processes including Unit Testing and TDD</li><li>Strength in NodeJS ideal, open to a polyglot</li><li>AWS or GCP exposure a plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p>If you're interested in blank slate/greenfield software engineering and new products, please explore this position. The Software Engineers we've placed on this team like it for several reasons, including a ton of new development and work/life balance (not more than 40 hour weeks).</p><p><br></p><ul><li>About the BayTech Group: We are independent. We don't work as part of a global staffing firm and we only work on a limited number of preferred, attractive positions with reputable organizations. We aim for professionalism and we won't waste your time.</li></ul><p></p>
